description: The initiative, Verdenergia, is a community-focused project in Costa Rica that combines sustainable farming with a vision for a healthy lifestyle. Co-owned by Joshua and a group of friends and family, it aims to regenerate the land while fostering positive relationships with local farmers. The project emphasizes permaculture practices, community engagement, and educational opportunities, all while promoting biodiversity and food security. Verdana serves as a model for integrating ecological sustainability with social responsibility.
name: Verdenergia
